channel.title: Is SCAR always so outdated nowadays?
channel.description: I've been looking through this forum and I haven't seen any actually up to date/recently posted scripts. I've come across a few that have been updated but that isn't near enough to actually show activity here.

item.title: Is SCAR always so outdated nowadays?
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:10, topic:235396”][quote author=Freddy1990 link=topic=310446.msg2483437#msg2483437 date=1223679846]

rsbot.com

RSbot practically whipped out SCAR.

lol.

This isn’t the official website of SCAR, IIRC it’s www.srl-forums.com

freddy1990.com is the official SCAR site! :mad:
[/quote]

Ofcourse I meant SRL, sorry freddie :([/quote]

too late, youve already hurt his feelings… he’s now crying himself to sleep every night… i hope your happy :@

Read full topic

item.title: Is SCAR always so outdated nowadays?
item.dc:creator: @JukuG JukuG
item.description:
@JukuG wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

Well, SCAR has had it days IMO. Color clickers arn’t that effective, especially after RSbot came out. RSbot might not work anymore, but it was way better then SCAR.

RSBot still works.

Read full topic

item.title: Is SCAR always so outdated nowadays?
item.dc:creator: @JukuG JukuG
item.description:
@JukuG wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:3, topic:235396”][quote author=Frell link=topic=310446.msg2477801#msg2477801 date=1223346448]
rsbot.com

RSbot practically whipped out SCAR.
[/quote]

SCAR still works, rsbot does not(as you can tell if you visit the website).[/quote]

I know about them as well, and the bot still runs but as the new version is under dev. the scripters dumped this one.

R.I.P RSC:

This isn’t the official website of SCAR, IIRC it’s www.srl-forums.com

That site is only contains slightly more improved scar scripts
